segments.text: Now tell me , what's your problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't feel like eating . And I cannot sleep well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , a low fever . I feel terrible . Am I dying ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly not . Take one of these white pills three times a day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Before the meals or after the meals ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After the meals . And do not forget to take two sleeping pills before going to bed .
segments.speaker: S1
